attributes.action: Look into Virgin Media's price hikes.
attributes.background: Virgin Media have hiked prices for far too long, bills are going up twice a Year. My bill, Like most other's is/was nearly £30 a month more now than it was 18 months ago.£50.99 on March 2015, now £78 a month.

rejection.details:
Pricing of Virgin Media services is the responsibility of Virgin Media.

If you think that the Government or Parliament should take a specific action on broadband prices in general, you could start a new petition about that.
